reviewText:
Lusty Latin Ladies is a two video set that was released on June 6, 2000. Lusty Latin Ladies is the follow-up to Hot Latin Ladies. Maria Checca, who was in Hot Latin Ladies, is in this on too. Video one (Lusty Latin Ladies) is one hour and one minute long and is hosted by The Baka Boyz: Eric V. and Nick V. Video one stars the following twelve ladies.

Maria Checa-Columbia
August 1994 Playmate of the Month
Sonia Flores-Mexico
Miriam L. Gonzalez-Puerto Rico
Monica Mendez-Mexico
Iveth Cortez-Honduras
Ida-Peru
Paola Aravena-Chile
Tera Patrick-Argentina
February 2000 Penthouse Pet of the Month
Nina Camille-Mexico
Amelia Nicole Garduno-Puerto Rico
Lucia Loza-Mexico
Kat Castillo-Mexico

As you can see, Mexico leads the way with five ladies and the only other country that is represented more than once is Puerto Rico. All twelve ladies are beautiful and sexy to look at. Below are the follow segments in this video.

Photo Shoot-Topless first half\nude second half, but worth the wait
El Matador-Complete nudity is less than a minute
Dance With Me-Wait about three minutes and the nudity begins
La Bandita-Two Nude Ladies
W-Love Late Night-Limited nudity
Desperado-Wait a few minutes before the two lovely ladies go nude
Aztec Princess-Two sexy and beautiful nude ladies

El Matador and W-Love Late Night were the two biggest disappointments. Also if you gave the two hosts less air time, then this video would have been even better. Lusty Latin Ladies gets an AAA+++.

Video two is seventeen minutes long. The first four minutes are dedicated to the making of Lusty Latin Ladies. The remaining thirteen minutes is dedicated to Maria Checa- August 1994 Playmate of the Month. Some of the clips on the video were from the Hot Latin Ladies video. There were only two segments that she is truly nude, otherwise it is a disappointment. I don't think Maria would have cut it as a Penthouse Pet or a Hustler Honey. This video gets a B+. Overall the two videos together get an A-. I would have given it a higher grade if the Maria Checa was not included.

DVD FEATURES

Play Program
Chapter List
1) Baka Boys Introduction
2) Photo Shoot
3) El Matador
4) Dance With Me
5) Baka Boys Rest
6) La Bandita
7) Maria
8) Love Late Night
9) Desperado
10) Aztec Princess
11) End Credits
Bonus Features
1) Lusty Latin Ladies: Behind the Scenes
2) Maria Checca: Playmate Profile
Slide Show
"DANCE WITH ME" is my favorite scene. The latin moves!!! soft and sexy. Professional dancers in the background. HOT!!! Very HOT!!!.  Mike J. Jackson. Provo, Utah

Exceptional looking young ladies. Very sexy, very attractive, not a throw away in the bunch. Could have done without the commentary from the two clowns that intro'd each segment. They were annoying.

The scene with the attractive young lady that was a playmate was boring. The other scenes were on fire. Monica,The first scene with the bullfight theme was on the Peach Wet video(That was pleasant surprise). This is one to buy.

Had it not been for the late night radio scene by the playmate( Maria Checa?) I would have given this one a 5. Worth the money.
haha good film. The only problem is not too much is shown.. I would have liked to see some sex scenes are something, but its still good.

I just got this DVD of Latin Women and I tell you, this is my
second DVD i have purchased and its great! the Women are amazing. I am a huge miriam gonzales fan,her chest is a HOTTTTT! when she disrobed i melted! its the Bandita scene I believe.....
I liked the interaction of the women in this video, they were so
natural and definitely were giving the latin women there props which is a MUST! Then I came to the Aztec princess scene, something about women on women it just does something for you! I recommend highly this DVD if you appreciate the latinas out there. I think this video is great for couples too. If you want to be startin' something (you know) The bodies on these women are worth the watch. there nudity is something of an art form. I hope to see more of these in the future from Playboy HOT LATIN WOMEN III, some suds and more interesting scenery! the only thing is the BAKA BOYS interview, it was OKAY but rather see a regular women off the street interview these women especially of latin background, because its women who are creating this expressive art form that is tastefully done!
